name: Star Husky
description:
Star Husky

A small simple game that works on phones and desktop. This game was initially made in about 2 days for a competition. It has since been slightly revamped to improve the readability of the code etc.

The assets and source code are all available, you can remix them as you wish.

How to Play

Mouse - The husky will follow your mouse as you move it across the screen.

Touchscreen - Hold your finger down at all times and the husky will follow it.

[M key] - Toggle mute

[P key] - Toggle paused

[C key] - View credits
